talents.name: Apotheosis
talents.prerequisites: You are devoted to a god
talents.effects: Choose a transformation based on your god. You gain an ability fitting that transformation and lose this talent. Talk with your GM about the specifics of your new talent.

talents.name: Alchemy
talents.effects: You can use alchemy formulas. Create alchemical ingredients by using rest dice the same way you would restore HP. (Roll any number of rest dice and gain the result as ingredients) This talent allows you to learn more specialized alchemy talents.

talents.name: Backstab
talents.effects: Deal +3 damage when attacking distracted or surprised targets.
